title: Best of The Herd: 07/15/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 07/15/2019
description:
Colin talks about Anthony Davis playing in obscurity for most of his career and now people will finally watch him in LA. He thinks the idea that Russell Westbrook can change his game to accommodate James Harden just isn't realistic. He admits where he was right and wrong over the last week in sports. Plus, Saints DE and 4x Pro-Bowler Cameron Jordan comes in studio to talk about his rivalry with Cam Newton and how difficult it is to rebound as a team from 2 years of heartbreaking playoff losses.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
